review: a little more stealthy than id like but this is a very sold 2d ninja game  we may never get another tenchu so enjoy games like this when they come around

i remember playing the original but the game didnt click with me back then  the remaster works great on the same deck looks awesome and the gameplay is phenomenal    this is objectively a good game and the commentary in the remaster is a fun inside look from the pov of the various developers

very good classic stealth game many options for sneaking towards the objective scorebased levels with leaderboards for replayability it came out in 2012 on xbox live arcade but all those games hold up and are still very much worth playing ive played many of these it sits at the top along with deadbolt gunpoint and trilby art of theft

awesome game and crazy ending please play and i will kiss you
